text:
I would like to express my heartfelt gratitude to the teachers at LFP 460. Making the decision to transfer my child, who is currently in K2 was not an easy one. Initially, I was quite skeptical and hesitant, as I was worried about how well he would adapt to a new environment, new teachers, and new classmates. However, looking back now, I can confidently say that it was one of the best decisions I have made for his education and overall development.

Since joining LFP 460, I have noticed remarkable improvements in his learning progress, as well as a boost in his confidence and positive energy. The dedication and support from his K2 teachers, Teacher Aubrey and Li Xue Loashi, have played a notable role in helping him settle in comfortably and positively in his new school. Their patience, encouragement, and commitment have made a huge difference in his journey.

I would also like to extend my sincere appreciation to the center principal, Ms Sandra for the support and guidance throughout this transition. Knowing that my child is in a warm, caring, and enriching learning environment gives me great peace of mind.

Sent both our kiddos to Little Footprints at Tampines 460 and we‚Äôve had an amazing experience with them. All the teachers are very nurturing and genuinely cares for the kids. Very grateful to Teacher Thivya, Teacher Cindy, Teacher Aubrey and Li Laoshi for taking such good care of our kids!

I especially appreciate Auntie Susan and Auntie Neni for cooking for the kids and keeping the school environment clean! We feel confident knowing that our kids are in good hands! The team is very well led by Principal Ms Sandra who is very caring and responsive to parents, kids and staff! ü´∂üèª

A great place for playgroup onwards. Very awesome teachers and non teaching staff. Shouout to Teacher Liza and Teacher Mira. My daughter loves her time spent in school. Shoutout to Auntie Nanny too for being a grandmother-like figure for my daughter

My child have been with the school since she was 18 months. Teachers are very professional and if you have any concerns or issues about your child they will definitely provide you with their professional advices and feedbacks.
